channel.title: I have tried everything and still get this error! [UnsupportedClassVersionError]
channel.description:
Ever since I have reformatted I get this error :
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Thanks for helping I have tried everything and cannot get this working, I'd love a step by step, I tried the other guides and it didn't work out.
[b]EDIT[/b]: I get this when I typically try to run any client or server.
I'm trying to run Glakons client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 06:42:45 PM[/size[hr]Help :mad:

item.title: I have tried everything and still get this error! [UnsupportedClassVersionError]
item.dc:creator: @LearnoPop LearnoPop
item.description:
@LearnoPop wrote:

Ever since I have reformatted I get this error :

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

Thanks for helping I have tried everything and cannot get this working, I’d love a step by step, I tried the other guides and it didn’t work out.

EDIT: I get this when I typically try to run any client or server.

I’m trying to run Glakons client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 06:42:45 PM[/size[hr]Help :mad:
